c-1: ^Hmm... Let me go over how the speciespedia works again, ok?

knot1: ^Try to log information on foxes, frogs, and fireflies on your speciespedia.
^Access the speciespedia by pressing [P] and clicking on the different tabs of the book.
^How should I log animals into the speciespedia

c-0: ^For foxes and frogs, you need to distract them with bait (Use [Q] or [E] and touch them in order to automatically log them in the speciespedia. For fireflies you just need to move near them. Got it?

knot2: ^Good luck! Come back if you are still confused.
